messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/10/03 1:43:15 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Yes a liquid, very small amount, usually add a little OJ or something to sweeten it up a
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/10/03 1:43:15 PM Eastern Standard Time,
kdollinger@... writes:

> Is this a liquid? I remember drinking a small cup of something before
> having wisdom teeth out then waking up later all done. No problem.
>
>

Yes a liquid, very small amount, usually add a little OJ or something to
sweeten it up a little. But for a 7 year old you could probably talk to them
about it. Usually child falls asleep, may wake up during the procedure but
usually doesn't remember.
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
